page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area is fortunate not to have a high unemployment rate.Mining was at one time the main occupation.Now all deep mines in EAST LOTHIAN are closed. 400 miners work in MID-LOTHIAN pits. Women are employed in local shops or travel 6 miles to Haddington to factories or hospitals.Most workers travel to Edinburgh.The nearest job centre is Musselburgh and they could not supply us with specific unemployment figures for TRANENT. Figures for 9th May 1985 show 2306 males and 1293 females in EAST LOTHIAN 122 male and 106 female school-leavers The Youth Training Scheme has placed nearly 500.When interviewed most said that while it was better than roaming the streets they would rather have a real job.They were fed-up being moved about with little chance off permanent employment.
